on-background.comment: Displayed on top of the background color

on-error.comment: Displayed on top of the error color

on-primary.comment: Displayed on top of the primary color

on-secondary.comment: Displayed on top of the secondary color

on-surface.comment: Displayed on top of the surface color

primary-light.comment: Primary Color at 65% opacity.  Used on hover/pressed state of the button.

primary.comment: The primary color of your brand

secondary.comment: The secondary color of your brand

secondary-light.comment: Secondary Color at 65% opacity.  Used on hover/pressed state of the button.

surface.comment: Background color of components such as cards, sheets, and menus.
